title: Architects & Designers: Join Gatsby for LA Fix-and-Flip Projects
excerpt: Gatsby Investment is seeking architects and interior designers to collaborate on a steady stream of fix-and-flip and ground-up development projects in Los Angeles. Enjoy consistent work, portfolio growth, and the chance to focus on your craft while we handle the business side.

content.text: Why Partner with Gatsby for Fix-and-Flip Projects?

items: Steady pipeline of fix-and-flip and new build projects—no need to hunt for clients.
Boost your credibility by partnering with an established real estate investment company.
Diverse project types: from budget-conscious flips to luxury renovations and new construction.
Collaborate closely with our in-house team and have your design input valued at every stage.
Expand your portfolio with high-quality, market-ready homes.
Licensed architects with experience in single-family and multi-family residential projects.
Strong understanding of LA zoning laws and building codes.
Ability to balance creative design with practical, investment-focused solutions.
Proven track record of meeting deadlines and working within budgets.
Interior designers with a knack for both high-end and value-driven renovations.
Knowledge of materials and finishes that appeal to LA buyers and investors.
Excellent collaboration skills to work with investors, contractors, and homeowners.
Sign up for a free account on our platform.
Complete a brief questionnaire about your experience and expertise.
We’ll review your credentials and portfolio.
If you’re a fit, we’ll schedule a meeting to discuss collaboration.
Join our exclusive network and start working on new fix-and-flip opportunities.

content.text: If you’re ready to focus on design while we handle the logistics, Gatsby wants to work with you. Help us transform LA’s neighborhoods, one project at a time!
